posts.post_content:
[URL=http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=502468&d=]Attachment 502468[/URL]Hi, for sale I have a 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin HOF Johnny Evers PSA 6. Front centered very well  with the back off a little. Would like $99 with a paypal gift or F/F paid To [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]. I will pay for shipping.[URL=http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=502466&d=]Attachment 502466[/URL]

Email me for larger pictures.

Thanks,
Joe
